title: Purchase Agreement
description: A purchase template that automatically generates a PDF document

components.switchToManualModeLabel: Can't find address? Switch to manual mode.

components.html:
Dear {{data.buyerName}},

This Purchase Agreement ("Agreement") is entered into on {{ data.buyerSignatureTimeStamp }}, by and between {{data.sellerName}} ("Seller") and {{data.buyerName}} ("Buyer").

1. Property or Item Description: The Seller agrees to sell, transfer, and convey to the Buyer, and the Buyer agrees to purchase from the Seller, the following property or item (the "Property"):

[Provide a detailed description of the property or item, including any relevant details such as specifications, condition, and any included accessories or components.]

2. Purchase Price: The total purchase price for the Property is [insert amount] (the "Purchase Price"). The Buyer agrees to pay the Purchase Price as follows:

[Specify payment details, such as down payment, installment amounts, and due dates.]

3. Delivery and Acceptance: The Seller agrees to deliver the Property to the Buyer on or before [insert date]. The Buyer shall have [insert number] days from the date of delivery to inspect the Property and notify the Seller of any defects or issues.

4. Title and Ownership: The Seller represents that they have good and marketable title to the Property, and upon payment of the Purchase Price, ownership and title of the Property shall transfer to the Buyer.

5. Warranties: The Seller makes no warranties, express or implied, regarding the Property's fitness for a particular purpose or its merchantability.

6. Governing Law: This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [your state/country].

7. Default: In the event of default by either party, the non-defaulting party shall have the right to pursue legal remedies.

8. Miscellaneous: Any modifications or amendments to this Agreement must be in writing and signed by both parties.
